metadata.name: A forehead kiss to my mom! #1
metadata.description:
Around 12 p.m., I spotted this cheetah family, but the mother kept her cubs concealed within the thickets until dusk. As the light faded, she decided to come out with her youngsters, and the babies started running around and playing with each other. I got extremely lucky to capture this particular frame during their playtime.

Location : Masai Mara National Reserve, Kenya.

About Photographer: 
Subhash Nair is an Indian wildlife photographer who has been photographing nature and wildlife since 2007. He loves telling jungle tales through his photographs and connect people with nature and its inhabitants.

Gears used: 
Camera : Nikon D850 | Lens : 400mm (2.8)

Edition : 1/1 

Collection : Mothers from the wild
